cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to a negative value will cause configuration validation failure and prevent proper initialization of the CU processing threads.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to zero will cause invalid configuration for downlink transmission and result in setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為零會導致下行鏈路傳輸的無效配置，並造成設定失敗。
